ListPreference.android:title: Reply to:
ListPreference.android:summary: Select whether an auto reply is sent for missed calls, text messages, or both.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Response with Calendar On
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This message supports the [end] and [name] insertables.
EditTextPreference.android:defaultValue: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment. I'll get back to you around [end].

EditTextPreference.android:title: Response with Calendar Off
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This message is used when Calendar Integration and Driving Detection are both disabled.
EditTextPreference.android:defaultValue: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Response while Driving
EditTextPreference.android:defaultValue: Sorry, I'm on the road. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Calendar Integration
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Only auto responds if you are currently in an event marked as busy.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Driving Detection
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Text Secretary will auto-respond when you are driving.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start Service on Boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically start Text Secretary when you power on your device.
A notification will be displayed for every auto-reply Text Secretary sends.

ListPreference.android:title: Do Not Disturb
ListPreference.android:summary: Silence the ringer for texts or incoming calls when Text Secretary would normally auto-reply. *Experimental*

ListPreference.android:title: Single Response
ListPreference.android:summary: Only respond once to a recipient for a selectable amount of time.
